title: Nigerians Urge Leaders: Forget Politics, Find Our Girls Now
teaser: Nigerians are outraged that more than 200 kidnapped schoolgirls still haven't been found. NPR's Ofeibea Quist-Arcton and journalist Chika Oduah give the latest developments.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
